#text=Today I am going to bake a Lemon Pound Cake .
#text=I look at the recipe gather all of the ingredients I will need and put them on the counter .
#text=I get out one lemon cake mix , one instant lemon pudding , four eggs , a one cup measuring cup that I fill with water , and 1\/3 cup measuring cup that I fill with vegetable oil .
#text=I turn on my oven to 350 in order for it to preheat while I am preparing the batter .
#text=I get out my bunt pan and spray it with cooking oil .
#text=I put my mixer on the counter and plug it up .
#text=I remove my mixing bowl and add each of my ingredients to the mixer ' s bowl except the eggs .
#text=I put the bowl back on the mixer stand and start mixing the ingredients at slow speed .
#text=After a minute I add the eggs to the mixture one at a time and let it continue mixing for another two minutes .
#text=Then I pour my cake batter into the bunt pan and put it in the oven for an hour .
#text=After an hour I take it out .
#text=I place a plate on top of my bunt pan and then turn it upside down so that the cake is now on the plate .
#text=I let the cake sit for two hours .
#text=Now I ' m going to put lemon icing on it that I bought from the store already prepared .
#text=I get a spatula and open the icing .
#text=I use the spatula to spread the icing evenly all over the cake .
